title: Ticket #2164: --test-class in condor_nmi_submit should be extended
description:
The --test-class functionality in condor_nmi_submit which allows one to choose the test class (e.g., "quick", "simple", "stduniv") doesn't function when using the --build option to condor_nmi_submit, only the --test option.

What I need is to be able to specify --build and --test-class together so when the test is submitted after the build in the build's platform_post script, I get only the test class I expect.
remarks:
2011-May-18 13:40:38 by psilord:
Since I figured out a workaround, I can leave this ticket as new instead and shove it into the "idea network" at priority 5.
